direction.raw_text: a view of the EARTH. The vibrant BLUE of its
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is striking against the vast BLACK VOID of space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R TO THE EARTH, where the shimmering PACIFIC OCEAN meets the CALIFORNIA COASTLINE... A bird's-eye view of LOS ANGELES comes into relief-- a criss- cross of streets, freeways. The buildings not more than dots. Keep MOVING CLOSER as SOUND FADES IN. We notice MOVEMENT through the sprawl of city now: MASSES OF PEOPLE and CARS moving AWAY FROM THE OCEAN as we arrive at...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . - GROUND-LEVEL - DAY The SOUND is at a frantic pitch here-- The sound of CHAOS on the streets. People SCREAMING, CAR HORNS BLARING as CARS jockey for position, moving eastward among...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on foot, their PANICKED FACES rushing past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : LOS ANGELES-- CONTACT + 1 HOUR as we...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : MARINE CORPS BASE, CAMP PENDLETON. OCEANSIDE, CA. Then SUPER: THE DAY BEFORE... We are CLOSE ON: SERGEANT MICHAEL NANTZ late 30s, tall, battle-hardened, staring forward, listening impatiently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY (O.S.) Must be some kind of mistake... Company 1st SERGEANT JOHN ROY, also late 30s, sits behind his desk, holding Nantz' file. Smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY I got paperwork here, with your signature, says you're retiring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ No mistake, John.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY My ass. You got a box full a', medals, file full a' commendations. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY (cont'd) Hell, everything but the Good Conduct.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ They can take the Good Conduct Medal and shove it up their...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY (LAUGHS) See, that's what I'm talking about, Mike. You're a marine! Nantzsmiles back now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ I appreciate it, John. You know that. But, I been to too many funerals. Had to visit too many moms and dads, tell 'em about what happened to their sons...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY Look. You're on that training assignment right now. Why don't you just ride it out for a month or two. See how you feel...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ I did my twenty. I'm done. Roy takes this in, nods. He stands, holds his hand out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY You're gonna miss it. Nantz shakes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Wanna bet?
direction.name: direction

result.heading: THE GREEN WASH OF NIGHT VISION GOGGLES

direction.raw_text: Looking out onto ROLLING HILLS and TREES... We hear (O.S.) :
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #1 (O.S.) I don't see it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #2 (O.S.) I'm telling you, it's in the trees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From the 1st Platoon, 2nd battalion, 5th Marines (the 2/5).. Camo uniforms, NIGHT VISION GOGGLES on, stare into the DARK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO, 20, linebacker-big, shakes his head, frustrated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO Screw it. I'm gonna launch another one... The other marines back away quickly as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: N to see we're...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Correggio, GOLF CLUB in hand, steps to a golf tee. WHACK. He tees off. The marines follow the ball as it sails into the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO - That's more like it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LENIHAN, 18, baby-faced, looks impressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LENIHAN Sweet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY, 19, a dense but good-natured country boy, moves to the tee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Don't encourage him. Correggio's freakin' ego's big enough already. He takes the club from Correggio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Let an expert show you how it's done, bro. Imlay TEES OFF, his swing plainly choppy, uncoordinated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: THROUGH IMLAY'S NIGHT VISION GOGGLES As he WHACKS THE BALL, visible in the night vision's greenish glow. It HOOKS into a sand trap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY (O.S.) Mother fu...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Then he stops as a LIGHT flashes beyond the trees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Foot mobiles. 3 O'clock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO Told you they'd come!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: signal with a FLASHLIGHT. Then race down a small hill onto the golf course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GOLF COURSE - LATER The THREE GIRLS sit around a beat-up TAHOE parked near the tee, CASE OF BEER on its back gate, sipping beers. Corpsman ADUKWU, 20, a tall, thin Nigerian, TEES OFF.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY That dog'll hunt! Damn, Daktari, you can play!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have courses in Nigeria, Imlay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Well, how would I know? I mean, it's an American game.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LENIHAN Actually, Imlay, it's Scottish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS, 19, an antsy fireplug of a guy, shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS Lenihan, you as good with an M-16 as you are with your mouth?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Kerns. Lay off him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS What? Just wanna make sure the rookie won't fold under fire. Correggio shoves a beer into Kerns' hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO Relax, dude. He throws an arm around Kerns' shoulder, smiles at the girls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO My buddy's jumpy 'cause he got an assfull a' shrapnel our last tour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS I'm jumpy? You're crawling up your own ass 'cause we train with Sgt. Nantz tomorrow. Correggio eyes Kerns. This was the wrong thing to say. One girl, smiling seductively, steps to Correggio, takes the golf club.from him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If this is the officer's course, what happens if they catch you out here? She readies to take a shot. Correggio snuggles up behind her, ostensibly teaching her how to swing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO We can handle it, baby. We're experts at night maneuvers. Nearby, the SECOND GIRL chats up Adukwu.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're from where again? Imlay pops a beer, interrupting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Nigeria. Adukwu's our corpsman. Like a medic. Saved Kerns' ass. (TO ADUKWU) Daktari, tell her about Nigeria. Adukwu starts to talk, but Imlay interrupts again:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Adukwu's a green card marine... (motions to Lenihan) And Lenihan here-- He's just green. Mom signed so he could join at 17. I'm looking after him since he don't know his ass from a hot rock. Lenihan suddenly ducks behind the Tahoe, throwing up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're doing a good job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Yeah. We always take the new meat out here to christen 'em... Lenihan shuffles back out from behind the Tahoe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Hey, barfy. Grab your beer. toast. Everyone holds beers aloft. Lenihan joins in reluctantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY To Lenihan. Who gets his first taste a' those hills tomorrow. He points off to the HILLY, DESOLATE TERRAIN near the course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS Good luck, rookie. The marines chuckle knowingly, about to drink... Then they hear the sound of TIRES skidding to a halt. They look toward the hillside, see the WHITE HELMETS'of MPs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO MPs! The marines grab the goggles and clubs, pile...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With the girls. The Tahoe skids away, the beer CRASHING off' the back. The first girl eyes Correggio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Experts, huh? Correggio grins sheepishly. She smiles. sweetly, taking his hand, writing her PHONE NUMBER on the back of it as...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A modest working-class two bedroom apartment. A TELEVISION on in the b.g.. A NEWS PROGRAM:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .what appears to be an unprecedented meteor shower, falling off the Falkland Islands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BENNIE MARTINEZ, 25, whose youthful looks and open smile contrast with his muscular frame, rolls in bed to see... His wife, ANNA, 24, sitting on the edge of the bed next to him, turning something over in her hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ What are you doing up so early? She holds up the object in her hands-- It's Martinez'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant. I still have to get used to that. She kisses him lightly, stands. Martinez smiles, watching her move off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ Yeah, lot of things we gotta get used to. We see her VERY PREGNANT BELLY now as she smiles back, exits. As she does, Martinez turns back to the TELEVISION:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: falling into a distant ocean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) This dazzling display is visible from Argentina to Southern Chile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martinez, in uniform now, exits the ground-floor apartment, heads to HIS CAR as Anna exits, watching him go, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call me later.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ (SIMULTANEOUS) I'll call you later. He stops, smiling back at her now. She waves coyly. Then Martinez is RUNNING BACK TO THE APARTMENT. Moving with the grace of the college football player he was just a few years ago. We don't go with him. Just observe from a distanceas... Martinez arrives at Anna, who laughs as he leans down, kissing her stomach now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TRAINING COURSE - MORNING The 1st PLATOON of the 2/5, 39 marines, all 18-23 years old, sweating as they RUN HILLS in FULL GEAR in the blazing sun. Key on the MARINES FROM THE GOLF COURSE, staring forward at... Nantz, running up ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS Heard Nantz put in his papers. He's out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO Good. Wish he done it years ago. Lenihan, struggling, breathing hard, looks up at this,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as he does. Nantz, looking back at the chatter, sees... Imlay grab hold of Lenihan, helping him forward now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Goddamn it, Imlay, you gonna wipe his ass for him, too? Every man carries his weight! Nantz drops back, runs alongside the struggling Lenihan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Just quit, Lenihan. Do us all a favor. 'Cause the squad's only as strong as the weakest man.,.. Lenihan STUMBLES and FALLS IN THE DIRT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ And right now you're getting us all killed. You hear? On these words, NANTZ MEETS EYES WITH CORREGGIO, further back in the pack. Nantz looks away, sees... Imlay, suddenly at Lenihan's side, helping him up. Nantz shoves Imlay away, knocking him onto his ass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ You think you're helping him, Imlay!? You think you're making him stronger?! Nantz puts a boot into Imlay's chest, shoving him flat. Correggio stares at this, steaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Stay on the goddamn ground, Imlay! You've just been gut-shot. (TO LENIHAN) Your buddy's down, bleeding to death, Lenihan. LZ's at the top of this hill. You gonna let this man die in the dirt on some stinking hill? Or are you marine enough to save him?! Lenihan stumbles to his feet, wiping dirt from his mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LENIHAN I'm gonna save him, sir! Lenihan bends, strains, somehow heaves Imlay up. He begins STUMBLING UP THE HILL, carrying Imlay on his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Come on, goddamnit! It's a hot LZ! The chopper's gotta move! They're gonna leave you BOTH to die!!! Lenihan staggers, knees trembling, weaving back and forth. Then his foot comes down on a ROCK IN THE TRAIL. His ANKLE GIVES WAY. Lenihan falls, yells in pain, grabbing his ankle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ GET UP!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LENIHAN I can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Don't you ever tell me you can't! Correggio takes a step towards Nantz now. Kerns stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO He's injured, Sergeant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A moment as they stare at each other. Nantz, voice like ice:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ He's not injured. He twisted his goddamn ankle. Nantz' looks over the men, sweaty, covered with grime.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ We are marines. "Can't" is not the code we live by. "Can't" gets marines killed. Do things the right way, the marine way, maybe you get to come home... Maybe your buddy gets to come home. Correggio stares back sullenly on this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Dying's easy, ladies. Everything else takes balls. Nantz spits on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Adukwu. Run a bag of saline into Lenihan and tape that ankle. We start back in ten minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . FLOWER SHOP DAY We recognize two marines from 1st platoon: CPL. DEVREY HARRIS, 22, African-American, steely, quick-witted, and CPL.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a Greek hulk with an easy smile. Harris stares at a TELEVISION on a table behind the counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) .meteors are falling off the coasts of California, Ireland, India, in the Bay of Bengal-- all less than ten miles from land...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU Man, I thought Lenihan was gonna wash out today.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HARRIS Hey, I remember carrying your fat ass up that hill hung over as shit. Newbie gets no sympathy from me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A woman, CHERISE, 22, Harris' fiancee, hurries over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For three hundred more, she said we could have sprays of lilies. I know it's a lot, but it'd be so beautiful. What d'you think, baby? Harris looks pained. But before he can speak up:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU Well, I think it's a no-brainer. You're only getting married once! What, are you gonna worry about three hundred bucks? Cherise looks expectantly to Harris, who smiles back weakly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HARRIS Of course, baby. Whatever you want She kisses him, heads to the florist as Harris turns on
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HARRIS Dude, what are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU Busting your balls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tomorrow we shop for cake. Stavrou throws an arm round Harris' shoulder, smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU I love cake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A drab, nondescript office. Kerns sits across a desk from the BASE PSYCHIATRIST, who's consulting a FILE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still not sleeping... And the nightmares?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS No. I mean, sometimes. But it's no big deal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not drinking, right, private? That's just a crutch...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS Alcohol? No, sir. Definitely not. The psychiatrist stares at this. Then WRITES in the file.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS So... What's my status? Am I cleared for combat? I feel good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's meet again next week.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two surfers-- CPL. GRAYSTON, 23, looking grizzled beyond his years, and PVT. SIMMONS, a spaced-out surfer vibe, sit on boards in the water, staring at...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: MPs, on the beach, waving them in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SIMMONS I don't know why they always have to give us shit. It's not fair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GRAYSTON Question is, why does everybody think life's supposed to be fair? Why do bad guys want to kill us? Why can't I have a nipple ring? Why is it the more power we get, the more we want? Nothing's fair, Simmons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SIMMONS (SMILES) Whatever, Corporal. I just like to blow shit up. Suddenly, a SIREN begins WAILING from the base. Grayston and Simmons exchange a glance. They start paddling in quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . TRAINING COURSE - DAY Nantz is running with another platoon of MARINES. Everyone slows as the SIRENS WAIL from the base.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Hold. The squad stops, following Nantz' gaze to... An approaching dust cloud, being kicked up by...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and TWO FIVE-TON TRUCKS Speeding up the dirt road toward the marines. Everyone is silent as they watch the HUMVEE and TRUCKS pull up... This is not normal. 1st Sergeant Roy hops from the Humvee, shouting:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY Marines! Into the trucks. Now. Proceed to the armory and draw weapons. The marines exchange glances, heading for the five-tons. Roy motions to Nantz, who follows him to the Humvee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ What's going on, John?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY Look, Mike, I know you're burnt out, ready to move on... Whatever you want to call it. But everybody's being deployed right now. And the platoon's down a sergeant. We need you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ For what? Do I have a choice here? They arrive at the Humvee. Roy turns to Nantz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY No. You don't. It's all hands on deck, Mike. Nantz nods, resigned. Starts climbing into the Humvee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Just don't lose my paperwork.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roy drives back to base, Nantz next to him. SIRENS are wailing, HELICOPTERS TAKING OFF in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .. ROY Meteor storm's hittin' up and down California now... All I know is, this is a helluva lot more than just some space rocks fallin' out to sea...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ What d'you mean? He turns., stares at Nantz.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY Whole base is being mobilized. There's some kinda' bad shit hittin' the fan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Humvee and five-tons swing into the base past a mass of activity: TRUCKS being loaded with supplies, TANKS driving onto flat cars, MARINES racing about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY You're assigned to 1st platoon, under Lt. Bennie Martinez. His platoon sergeant was rushing back to base, got in a car accident.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ What are the odds? As the Humvee pulls to the COMMAND BUILDING, Nantz sees...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ hurrying to meet them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ROY There's the lieutenant. Young, been with us three months, straight outta basics school. Bright kid, but this is his first deployment, so keep an eye on him, Mike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lenihan and Imlay, Correggio and Kerns are getting their gear together, hurriedly packing. Lenihan checks and double checks a LIST with the contents of his pack, ticking off 'poncho liner,' 'gore-tex jacket,' 'socks,' 'vest,' 'first aid kit,' flashlight'...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS It's probably just a drill, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY They shifted Nantz into our unit. Something must be going on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LENIHAN I heard Nantz kicked ass on his last tour. Went into a compound by himself, killed, like, ten insurgents...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO That what you heard? You don't know shit, Lenihan. Correggio, pissed, grabs his pack, heads for the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO Move your asses. They want us in the armory. And he's gone. Lenihan, confused, looks at Imlay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LENIHAN What's his problem?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Nantz lost a lotta guys on that tour. Correggio's brother was one of 'em. Lenihan nods, somber, getting it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nantz and Martinez walk through quickly. All around them,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: hurry, all responding to RINGING BEEPERS. Nantz peers into VARIOUS OFFICES. Every one is buzzing with activity: Clerks bustling, maps spread out, phones ringing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . And every office has a TELEVISION on. We hear OVERLAPPING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the offices they pass:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) .cluster of what appears to be meteors is tightly packed... hard for scientists to predict the size or quantity striking the oceans...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ They calling us.in because of these meteors, Lieutenant?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ I assume so... Maybe an evacuation. Whatever it is, it'll be good to get out in the field with the men. Nantz looks askance at this. Martinez catches it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ Look, Sergeant, let's be clear. I know your rep, know what you've done... But this is my unit. We're not gonna have a problem, are we?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ No problem, sir. It's all yours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At numerous windows,. LINES OF MARINES hand in weapons cards, receiving their weapons in return. Among them... The marines from 1st Platoon of the 2/5 (Correggio and Kerns, Stavrou and Harris, Imlay and Lenihan, Adukwu), all watching:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 20s, on a BEACH. Behind her, POLICE disperse thin CROWDS of PEOPLE, bullhorns blaring. A legend on the TV screen reads 'SANTA MONICA, CA.'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOTTOLA, squad radio man, tall and thin, listening to an
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and PVT. GUERRERO, lumbering, eyes on the TV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOTTOLA We never got a chance to finish the new mix, man. We were gonna add some metal to it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . GUERRERO We'll have time later.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The marines stare at the harried reporter on TV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .National Guard troops have flown in to evacuate all surrounding beach areas...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MOTTOLA (TREPIDATION) Yeah... Later.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nantz and Martinez crowd in among other SERGEANTS and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the COMPANY CAPTAIN briefing them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These objects were completely undetected until they entered our atmosphere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ So... what are they, Captain?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have no idea. But whatever they are, they're not hitting the water at terminal velocity. They're able to slow down before impact. Glances exchanged in the room now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is no meteor shower. Homeland Security has bumped the threat level to red. Marines, we are the first line of defense. All units gear up, be ready to move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The young marines from 1st platoon are still in line for their weapons along with many OTHER MARINES. Some are nervously bullshitting, others intently watching...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The REPORTER on the beach looks harried now as THICK SMOKE rolls in across the water. POLICE SIRENS wail in the b.g.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .some sort of smoke has appeared over the ocean now...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HARRIS Hey, shut up. Shut up! Others quiet down now. All focus slowly shifting to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The reporter on the beach is cupping her earpiece.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm being told a Coast Guard cutter just issued a Mayday... The TV SHOT PANS to the WATER... The DISTANT CUTTER lists to one side, SINKING below the waves as indistinct DARK SHAPES clamber onto it from the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Push forward, scrambling to the TVs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS What the hell are those things?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The CUTTER DISAPPEARS behind the thick rolling SMOKE. The camera PANS back to the REPORTER, silently staring out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - SAME Crowded with MARINES, including squad leader Grayston, all getting ready. Or they were... Right now, ACTIVITY HAS CEASED. Marines silently stare at...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The REPORTER ON THE BEACH staring out, clearly panicked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It appears... the cutter has... She stops, seeing the SMOKE reach the WATER'S EDGE. A HUSH falls over the CROWD as SMOKE rolls across the beach.

The PARK in the distance. A wide open FIELD with a COMMUNITY CENTER BUILDING on the far side. There are distant sounds of warfare, but the area here seems strangely quiet. Then, out of the smoke, an IMAGE APPEARS... Something MOVING AT THEM... The marines all shift, aim forward, about to blast away as...

direction.raw_text: come into view, moving ghost-like. Nantz signals with his flashlight. The marines hurry over, silently falling behind the cars.

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ You guys are 2/5?

direction.raw_text: Descending steadily, its thundering rotors whipping the air..

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ Load the wounded. Sgt. Nantz, Cpl. Harris-- let's find the civilians. Martinez, Nantz and Harris run to the community center as... The WOUNDED are hustled to the CHOPPER as it TOUCHES DOWN.

direction.raw_text: staring out, looking shell-shocked.

direction.raw_text: jacket and tie, behind her.

direction.raw_text: . Nantz, Martinez and Harris run to the chopper with the kids. The marines around the medevac are screaming up at it, trying to hold it, but to no avail. The CHOPPER GAINS ALTITUDE as suddenly...

result.heading: A SHOCK WAVE OF ENERGY FIRES

direction.raw_text: ! A SHOCK WAVE OF ENERGY FIRES from the west as... The MEDEVAC takes a DIRECT HIT. The devastating energy wave blasts it END-OVER-END... The massive helicopter CRASHES INTO A HOUSE blocks away, exploding, as... Nantz turns ominously as an unearthly BUZZING SOUND FADES IN.

direction.raw_text: are ADVANCING from a street leading to the field. As the SOUND and LIGHTS BUILD, Nantz runs to the other marines to get them off that field. He pulls on them, urging them to the COMMUNITY CENTER doors. They REACH THE COMMUNITY CENTER, fall into it just as... Glowing through the heavy cover of smoke... The STROBING LIGHTS of some strange ALIEN AIRCRAFT zooming overhead.

direction.raw_text: . Speeding toward Lincoln. FIRING PULSING WAVES OF ENERGY, lighting up the distant sky.

Nantz turns, can see the MEDEVAC ABLAZE out a window. His solemn stare hints at a growing desperation. Martinez steps up to him, looks out. Quietly:

Imlay wets a rag with water from his canteen, wiping the dust and dirt from the kids' faces. The younger girl, KIRSTEN, 8, begins crying. She suddenly hugs Imlay. Imlay, startled by this, looks uncomfortable at first. Then hugs the little girl back, smiling at the older.girl, ANY, 10, Kirsten's sister.

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ I...don't know. Right now, our job is just to get you to safety, okay? Harris appears from the hallway.

Ripped by bullets. They step to it cautiously, realizing... IT'S NOT QUITE DEAD! The alien MOVES, turning as if to stare back at them. Without a word, Nantz lifts his rifle, shoots it in the head.

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO (INTO RADIO) O.P. reporting. We're clear up here. Correggio and Kerns look over the destroyed streets, smoke and flames rising from buildings in the distance, glimpses of white phosphorous raining down. A beat, then...

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO .fucking aliens. Kerns looks at Correggio, starts to chuckle at the absurdity of it all. Then Correggio laughs. It's infectious. It's desperate. Then the laughter slows. Stops.

direction.raw_text: . KERNS You think those things get scared? They're probably just grunts like us. Probably dumped into battle, told to go fight... Kerns looks out... The constant thud and crack of warfare... A city crumbling. V PVT. KERNS I thought I could handle it...

direction.raw_text: . KERNS Shit. You seeing what I'm seeing? Correggio pulls BINOCULARS...

direction.raw_text: . Movement. ALIEN SHAPES massing on the side street. Appearing and disappearing through the smoke and trees. Then the POV THROUGH BINOCULARS PANS to pick-up... The BUS. Nearby. In the path of the alien movement. Correggio grabs the RADIO. Says:

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO (INTO RADIO) Harris. Movement, 1500 meters up

direction.raw_text: th. Suddenly, a loud BANG rings out below them.

direction.raw_text: . The organ stops vibrating. The glow fades. The body slumps.

direction.raw_text: ! Down the hall, the sound of a door splintering...

direction.raw_text: rising in the distance.

direction.raw_text: fill the sky, heading east. As they approach... The VIBRATION gets louder and louder, shaking the bus now.

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Everybody get down, weapons inside the bus. Make no noise. The men pull their guns in from the windows, crouching as low as possible, straining to see, hear... The vibrations grow louder, LOUDER! Suddenly... WHOOSH! An ALIEN AIRCRAFT rips overhead. Then another, and another, and another... All heading east. The image of their speed, their power, their other- worldliness is overwhelming, devastating. Nantz stares, relief flooding his face, as the armada flies on. Leaving them behind. Until... Suddenly, Mottola's RADIO BLARES!

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ It's coming back...! The children scream, marines agitated... all hear a low vibration, echoing off buildings, heading their way.

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ (staring at the radio,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ They're tracking our signals! All radios, cell phones-- keep everything off! Everyone stares silently, tensely. Then... A single BEAM OF LIGHT suddenly shines from the alien craft. Then the alien aircraft MOVES FORWARD again. Slowly. But still heading their way.

direction.raw_text: . MARTINEZ It's still coming... It's searching... Nantz grabs a PORTABLE RADIO. He looks around the bus, sees the little girl, Kirsten, ponytail in her hair. He leans down to her.

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO Sergeant's gonna get us killed! Just like my brother. A beat. Nantz eyes Correggio. It's laid open now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Believe me, Correggio, I grieved for every marine I ever lost... Nantz looks around now, from marine to marine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ But we are in the fight of our lives right now. And our duty is to keep moving forward. Keep fighting. That's how we honor men like your brother, Correggio. And Lt. Martinez. And Hector's father, who saved Adukwu's life. He wasn't trained for that. He just picked up a rifle and did what needed to be done. If a civilian can do that... (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ (cont'd) Well then I better square my shit away and do whatever I have to do to defeat this enemy. But I can't do it alone. Nantz stares. The tension is palpable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ I need you men. And maybe we'll die fighting today. Not because we're heroes. But because we're goddamn United States marines, and always will be. (BEAT) I'm willing to give my full measure for you. I'm hoping you'll do the same for me.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: THEN ALL THE MARINES RISE AS ONE

direction.raw_text: glances exchanged. THEN ALL THE MARINES RISE AS ONE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU Sergeant. We'll follow you to hell and back. Nantz smiles, nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Good. 'Cause that's where we're going.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The squad is moving in unison, covering all around, approaching the LAV. They jump in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stavrou fires it up, drives off as... Nantz eyes the jumble of gear. He grabs his COMBAT SHOTGUN, a portable RADIO, which he makes sure is OFF... Then an olive case marked: GLTD. He stuffs it in his pack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Laser target, sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Might have to get some cruise missiles in here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Shit, yes, Sergeant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU (CALLING OUT) Hostiles. Twelve o'clock. Nantz looks up to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: appearing on the street now. Nantz goes back to stuffing his pack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Just hit the gas, Corporal. We got plenty of armor. Everyone looks up at this. Then looks out to see... The aliens attacking, FIRING on the LAV as... Stavrou floors it, ALIEN FIRE pinging off the LAV's armor as... SPLAT!!!
direction.name: direction

result.heading: STAVROU MOWS THROUGH THE ENEMY LINE

direction.raw_text: . Nantz looks out the back to see some ALIENS STAGGERING AWAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Reverse, Corporal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU Aye, aye, Sergeant. As he BACKS UP, mowing back over the remaining aliens... The marines cheer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The LAV cruises slowly. Nantz stares forward. The BLACK DEAD ZONE looms ahead... As they get closer, it seems like the whole area is absent of light. A black hole. Nantz stares out, about to answer when the LAV LURCHES, then lurches again. Stavrou REVS the engine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU Losing power, Sergeant. Gauges are dropping... losing voltage... The LAV slows. The engine skips. Then the LAV DIES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Stavrou?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU She's dead, Sergeant. Nantz looks around, warily. The streets are quiet, deserted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ All right, dismount. Grab anything you think we can use. The men nod, and move OUT OF THE LAV to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Correggio and Kerns on one side of the street, Stavrou and Harris on the other. Imlay with Adukwu. Nantz watches his men move forward, covering each other's advance. Scanning' the buildings, searching for targets... Then Nantz halts them. They crouch together, peering at... The middle of the DEAD ZONE just ahead of them. It is very dark. No lights are visible from any source. The men SWEAT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Hot as hell here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO No lights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ADUKWU My watch stopped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Something's generating heat. Messing with our electronics. Sucking up all the power... Nantz scans the street. The sweat dripping into his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Where would you put a critical asset if you wanted to protect it? Or hide it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HARRIS Underground. Nantz points to A SUBWAY ENTRANCE AHEAD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The squad runs to the subway entrance, stopping just inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Harris, Adukwu, stay here, watch the street. Harris and Adukwu nod. Taking position at the entrance. Nantz motions to the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Let's go. Nantz leads Stavrou, Correggio, Kerns and Imlay down the stopped escalator to the SUBWAY PLATFORM. Nantz stands, gazing around at the empty subway platform. Silent. Spooky. A train is stopped. Doors open. It is dark, the only light bleeding in from the street above. He motions Stavrou to guard against anything coming from above. Then he moves forward with the others. A huge number of BIRDS line the dark cavity above the train tracks, taking cover themselves, roosting quietly. Nantz sees a DOOR in the tunnel wall, heads to it. He pulls his KA-BAR KNIFE out, sticks the blade into the door jam, pops the DOOR OPEN. Nantz turns to Correggio and Kerns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ (QUIETLY) You two stay here, watch our backs. (TO IMLAY) Imlay, come with me. Nantz and Imlay slip through the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nantz and Imlay stand very still, peering down the long, dark hall, looking for movement. Nantz motions and they move forward silently, guns ready. They turn a corner and stop. It is PITCH BLACK here. Nantz clicks on his flashlight. They move forward. After only a few feet, the FLASHLIGHT DIMS AND DIES. Imlay clicks on his flashlight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ (WHISPERING) No. Save it. Something is killing anything electronic we use. Imlay clicks his flashlight OFF. But now we see... A dim light ahead. Nantz and Imlay creep forward, very slowly. Turn a corner, see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: at the end of the hallway. THE LIGHT GLOWS fiercely, as if it's shining through the floor. Nantz, silhouetted by the light, signals Imlay to stay put. Nantz steps forward, toward the strange glow of light. As he approaches, he realizes it's coming through... An IRON GRATE in the floor. Nantz moves to the grate, kneels, PEERING DOWN INTO...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fifty feet wide, the dim tunnel has been further EXCAVATED. It is a huge CAVERN now, extending off into the distance further than Nantz can see. The huge space is illuminated by MASSES OF ALIEN MACHINERY. An ELECTRIC HUM FILLS THE AIR. Tending the machinery: DOZENS OF ALIENS, bigger than the others. One of the ALIENS TURNS, focusing up, right at Nantz. Nantz spins, runs back into the darkness. Calling to Imlay:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Run, Imlay! Run!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The iron GRATE FLIES into the air.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: INT.
location: DIFFERENT PART OF UNDERGROUND SERVICE TUNNEL

direction.raw_text: Nantz and Imlay, race along in the dark. They hear POUNDING FOOTSTEPS of the alien pursuing him. A glimmer of LIGHT ahead. Along the floor. It is, a DOOR. They burst through a DOOR, into...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Nantz follows Imlay UP THE STAIRS as... The STAIRWELL DOOR below is SMASHED OPEN. Nantz spins, swinging his shotgun. HE FIRES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The blast ILLUMINATES the huge ALIEN, filling the stairwell with its horrible bulk. Nantz backs up the stairs, pumping the shotgun, firing... Each blast ILLUMINATES THE ALIEN in a STROBE EFFECT. The alien moves up the stares. Nantz KEEPS FIRING. The NOISE IS DEAFENING in the enclosed space. Then the SHOTGUN RUNS DRY. And we're left IN DARKNESS. Imlay clicks on his FLASHLIGHT, revealing... The ALIEN at Nantz' feet, its strange "hand" on his boot. Nantz, terrified, aims at the alien, waiting to see if it will move. It doesn't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nantz and Imlay re-enter, running up to join the others. Up the stairs, by street-level, Harris and Adukwu keep watch. Harris motions: "ENEMY TROOPS". Nantz nods. Signals for all the marines to head down the stairs. The marines gather around Nantz. To Harris:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ How many?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HARRIS Hard to tell. A lot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ I think I got their attention. Nantz kneels. He opens his pack, pulls out the radio and the case marked GLTD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Look. There's something big down in the tunnels. It's sucking up a lot of power, could be a major Command &.Control asset.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Nantz stares at his men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ We need to destroy it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . KERNS But we got no jets left, right, Sergeant?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Hopefully, they can still fire cruise missiles from Pendleton or Vandenburg... I'll radio in a strike, paint the target from the street. You know what that means. The man nod solemnly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY We gotta hold 'em off long enough to paint the target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . STAVROU If we can get a transmission out before the radio dies...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HARRIS And the targeting laser lasts long enough for command to get a lock on the target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO Hell, dying's easy, ladies. Everything else takes balls, right? They all laugh softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Let's do it. He takes a deep breath, raises the radio, and TRANSMITS:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ (TRANSMITTING) Any station, this is Foxtrot 2 November. Priority Fire Mission. I have identified a major enemy command and control asset-- located grid 459083. 1 WILL BE LASING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) Foxtrot 2. You have visual confirmation of this C&C asset? We can't waste resources.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Affirmative. They're building a huge complex underground... I think it's the head of the snake. Repeat. I will be...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Alien fire EXPLODES now, rocking the station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BOOM! BOOM! Nantz and the marines cover their heads as the station starts to come apart, chunks of concrete fall. The walls crack. Dust fills the air. Nantz SCREAMS as a chunk of concrete FALLS ACROSS HIS ANKLE. Then, it's over. All is silent. Nantz, GRIMACING in PAIN, strains to lift the concrete chunk off his ankle. He GROANS. The marines rise. Pale, sweating, Nantz hobbles to his feet. He slings his rifle, and carrying the GLTD, hurries on his bad ankle to the stairs. Nantz looks up. Rubble nearly fills the stairway. There is only a small opening of daylight near the ceiling. The men all unclip their web gear, begin climbing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A chunk of rubble falls from the pile at the subway entrance, and Nantz emerges, rolling down the pile to the street. The other marines follow, set up a perimeter as..,. Nantz takes cover behind a berm of rubble, DROPPING down, flattening himself to the ground. He sets the GLTD (LASER DESIGNATOR) up on top of the pile. Nantz removes his flack jacket and places it over the laser designator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ (TO HIMSELF) Here we go...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Nantz switches on the TARGETING LASER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: shoots from the designator to a fixed point in the center of the street. Nantz looks up to see... The street fill with ALIEN SOLDIERS rushing out now.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: FORM A PERIMETER AROUND THE LASER, OPENING UP

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Here they come! The marines FORM A PERIMETER AROUND THE LASER, OPENING UP on the aliens as... The mass of aliens surges forward like a wave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Hold them back! We have to keep the laser on target! Nantz FIRES. An alien goes down. He picks another target and FIRES. The alien staggers, keeps coming. Three more rounds and the alien goes down. But the rest KEEP COMING... closing in...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: FOLLOWING THE BEAM OF THE LASER BACK TO NANTZ

direction.raw_text: . Nantz is picking his targets. AIMING, FIRING... Turning, finding targets, reloading, the aliens getting closer... Then his rifle runs dry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pulls his sidearm. He aim, FIRES, shooting a closing alien in its 'heart.' It drops. Rounds impact around Nantz as he shoots another alien... Then the next. The next. Then his sidearm is out of bullets as... An EXPLOSION rips near Nantz. Knocking the laser away. Nantz struggles...TO THE LASER. RE-AIMING it as...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: MORE ALIENS POUR INTO THE STREET

direction.raw_text: . The marines are pushed into a SMALL CIRCLE around the laser. Fighting nearly back to back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Kerns is HIT. He is thrown to the ground, but is back up, arm bleeding, firing. An alien RUSHES AT CORREGGIO who spins just in time, FIRING repeatedly until the alien goes down. Stavrou swings his rifle butt, SMASHING another alien. It staggers back. Stavrou puts numerous rounds into it. An alien reaches ADUKWU, knocking him to the ground, about to blast him... Harris runs the alien through with his bayonet, twisting and firing his rifle at the same time. The alien falls. The marines are FIGHTING AS ONE. All focused on SURROUNDING NANTZ. THEN THE LASER DIES. Imlay notices the laser beam is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Did we get a lock!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ I don't know! Then... An ear-splitting NOISE. The marines look up, see...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A CRUISE MISSILE COMING STRAIGHT DOWN THE STREET

direction.raw_text: ! Nantz looks up at his men, yelling:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ INCOMING! Fall back! This way! Nantz and his men begin BACKING AWAY. Firing as they do, trying to hold off the aliens. Nantz, limping on his injured ankle, GOES DOWN. Correggio is there to help him up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO Think you just twisted your ankle,. sir. And through it all, Nantz still smiles at this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Don't stop!! We're too close to the impact point!! The marines start running as...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: MORE CRUISE MISSILES APPEAR, RIPPING TOWARD THE GROUND

direction.raw_text: ! The first missile strikes! Then another...and another ...BOOOOM! BOOOOM! A piercing WHISTLE sounds. Nantz looks into the sky as... Suddenly KABOOOM!!! A 2000 pound laser-guided ARTILLERY SHELL explodes INTO THE GROUND...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . A MASSIVE EXPLOSION of fire and smoke erupting from beneath the surface.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A SHOCK WAVE BURSTS OUT FROM THE IMPACT POINT

direction.raw_text: ... DISAPPEARING as... Buildings shatter, cars are tossed, flames erupt. Then SILENCE descends a moment. Only the crackle of flames, falling glass. The dust and ash settles in a grey haze. Nothing could have survived this. BEAT. Then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: out of the grey destruction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ MARINES!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the men rise out of the ash, standing tall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ ON ME! The marines fall in. A PHALANX with Nantz at its center.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ FIRE! They move forward. Precise. Deadly. FIGHTING AS ONE. The seven remaining marines POUR FIRE on the mass of aliens. The Drone Ships fall from the sky, EXPLODING on the ground. The aliens, in disarray, are mowed down. The rest FLEE. And as the smoke drifts away, there is silence again. Nantz looks up to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . His warriors. Standing with smoking weapons, ready for more. Correggio staggers up, covered in dust, bloody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO You know what, Sergeant? My brother said you were a bad ass. (SMILES) I had no idea...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ Your brother was one helluva marine, Correggio. (SMILES BACK) So are you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nantz sits in the rumbling chopper. Surrounded by his marines. Imlay stares out at the city below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . IMLAY Man, it's quiet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.0.) They're in full retreat throughout Los Angeles, heading back into the ocean. Units are mopping up. On this, Nantz turns to his SQUAD. Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NANTZ This has been a hell of a battle. Plenty of other battles to go. Everybody good with that? The marines don't hesitate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Sergeant!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CORREGGIO Well, uh, actually, Sergeant... there's this girl I was supposed to meet up with tonight...
direction.name: direction
